I should also like to ask you to do one favor for us. As you
probably do know, a Regional Training Course on Educational
Television in South and East Asia is to be held in Tokyo from August
27th to September 22 of this year. Unesco has asked us to send
some representative kinescopes and I should be grateful if you could
make available to Unesco the three "Teaching by Television1' kines
and "DNA Molecule and Reproduction. " The office to contact in
Tokyo is:
Japanese National Commission for Unesco
4-3, Kasumigaseki
Chiyoda-Ku
Tokyo, Japan
We can let you keep the films for a period of six months and
therefore suggest that you return them to us in March, 1963.
With reference to clearance of the films, the only film re¬
quiring clearance would be "Exploring Nature" and we would be
willing to approach WGHB should you desire us to do so.
We look forward to receiving films in exchange from you and
do appreciate your cooperation.
Sincerely,
Brenda A. Cox
Staff Assistant
Education Program
